<<<<<<< HEAD
A publication by the counsell of Virginea, touching the plantation there Counseil for Virginia (England and Wales) Virginia Company of London.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
By Thomas Haueland for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swanne, Jmprinted at London : 1610.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
=======
